formalText: Discussed how Blue Cross insurance seems to be a pain.
Was asking about how to approve the request when they denied the request.
and she had gotten a check from them.
Told her I'd write you a check for what they've done so far and we will wait and see.
She wanted to explain how her party went really great and shared her entire speech during the session
Her speech was about her father.
She talked about how she really wanted to connect with everybody there at the party.
because she needs to show her devotion and interest.
She says it feels so scary to not want to try and when she feels like that's going to be the end of the world
She says when she falls  into that space and it's very bad and scary
Being social tires her out after a while.
She says she shows her devotion different than those
who are not trying to make a deep connection with everybody every single time.
She talked about trying to connect with every single person at the party and how it was exhausting. She couldn't understand how some people are social butterflies
At the speech, she found out more about her very early relationship with her oldest female cousin.
Her mother has a history of depression.
